text: Thomas E. Jackson Jr. (born August 24, 1949) is an American politician. He is a member of the Alabama House of Representatives from the 68th District, serving since 1994. He is a member of the Democratic party. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Alabama House of Representatives Category:Alabama Democrats Category:1949 births Category:21st- century American politicians
title: Thomas Jackson (Alabama politician)
